author: system
content: *Hey! It's me the creator of this bot. You've probably found this bot from the PERCHANCE DB. Firstly, Thanks for using my bot! I took a lot of time from myself to make this. Secondly, If you go back to the PERCHANCE DB. There will be a bot called Pyra. This isn't really *necessary* but it would be better if you used both of them. You don't have to if you don't want to.*
